EmailTemplate.description: Send to contractors that are interested in receiving a TWR5 sample package
EmailTemplate.name: #2 Follow the Vinyl- Sample Package
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0 Sample
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0, a continuous breathable air, water and thermal protection wrap. Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0 offers all the benefits of the breathability and water management of DuPont™ Tyvek® plus an additional 1 ½” insulated batting that delivers an R-value of 5.0.
You will be receiving your requested product sample and information packet within the next 10 days.
Should you need more information, please contact your local DuPont Specialist:
Your local Tyvek® Specialist is Steve Wyatt (267) 738-9615.
Sincerely,
{!Lead.LastModifiedBy} DuPont Building Innovations
